greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of 1/3 + 1/7 + 1/11 + ... + 1/(4n-1).
program: def a(n): return sum(Fraction(1, 4*i-1) for i in range(1, n+1)).denominator
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 21)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Mar 21 2021
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 27 2002
